rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, I heard everything from these Ma-non.
Good work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Newbie, it's fine to be fired up with justice, but
don't be too reckless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0003
rows.name: We only got so many spare parts to go around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Everything okay?
Is your body alright now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Of course!
I'm the one who did the maintenance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0005_m
rows.name:
Of course!
I'm the one who did the maintenance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0005_f
rows.name:
Of course!
I'm the one who did the maintenance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0006
rows.name: That's great, jan![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0007
rows.name:
It's thanks to you guys we could start living here,
so we were worried, yo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0008
rows.name: Wait[ST:wide ]― You're going to live here too, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0009
rows.name:
That's right. The NLA government
has concluded a friendship treaty with the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0010
rows.name:
To guarantee their safety,
we decided to provide them a place to settle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Director General Maurice,
so the talks concluded, I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Yes. Even if our species are different,
if communication is possible, they can be friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0013
rows.name: Those were your words from before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0014
rows.name: You remember things from a long time ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0015
rows.name: My memory's pretty good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0016
rows.name: While we were travelling through space[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0017
rows.name:
we got caught in navigation trouble for some unknown reason
and ended up on this planet, y'know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Because our ship uses technology
that the Samaar people don't have, y'see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0019
rows.name: You saw how bad they wanted it, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Samaar?
Wasn't the ones that attacked you Growth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0021
rows.name: Samaar is a huge interstellar federation, yo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0022
rows.name:
Their living space is
about a 6 million light-year radius, it's amazing, y'know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0023
rows.name: 6 million light years!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0023_2
rows.name:
Doesn't that mean they live
in multiple galaxies too?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0024
rows.name: Of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Growth is just a criminal syndicate.
Only a tiny part of Samaar, jan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0026
rows.name: You call that a tiny part...?[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Ma-non, we would appreciate it
if you could share your knowledge with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0028
rows.name:
Sure, sure! If it's something we know,
we'll gladly tell you, yo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Well then, Earthling friends,
please take care of us from now on, okay![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0030
rows.name: As citizens living together in NLA, okay![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05160100_MSG0031
rows.name: Here it comes! That's our ship, yo![ST:wait ]
